name: Chilevox
tagline: Add spicy voice to your bus terminal
body:
### Welcome to Chilevox

The first cloud based passenger information system for bus terminals that speaks out boarding public announcements in multiple languages, optionally can manage bus allocation to gates and provides visual announcements on tv screens.

For more information contact us at info@chilevox.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
